title: Busy Bags v1.2 [PD]
description:

As soon as the planes have landed, you are responsible for ensuring that the passengers collect their luggage. The faster, the better. If people lose patience, it costs you valuable points as the manager.

Paradise for mobile gamers

Ã¢â‚¬Å“Busy BagsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ draws you into a vibrant 3D world with a nearly unmatched richness of detail. At higher levels, the colourful action will test the multi-tasking skills of even experienced gamers.

The wonderfully simple gameplay with an easy 2-tap mechanic is perfectly suited to casual gaming. But the high score will only go to whoever can succeed in pleasing all the passengers.
